channel.title: Give seperate rights
channel.description:
can any help me with giving a player spertae rights
if you dont know what i am talking about, let me explain it.
saying, i want 1 mod to get the ability to ban but mods cannot ban
so how do give him ban rights.
i also wanna how to give pickup,ban,ipban,give,givemod,giveowner and stuff like that so how do i do that by giving those rights to seperate people who cannot do that.
Help would be great :)

item.title: Give seperate rights
item.dc:creator: @War-Ages War-Ages
item.description:
@War-Ages wrote:

You could do what he said or you could just Create New Rights.

Read full topic

item.title: Give seperate rights
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

[quote=“wwe justin, post:7, topic:321554”]Yep it worked thanks man it worked but also what if iwanna add a second person to it?

how do i do that?

And i know i hate xxlukexx, i was argueing him with another topic i started, hes is so childish[/quote]
I think you would carry on the command like so…
if (command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“MODSNAME”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“MODSNAME”)) {

Read full topic
